ygData.subject: RE: Twinking & Kiting
ygData.msgSnippet: I can see a great reason to do it.  You have a guild that is all high level characters.  You ve played a character to level 50 and want to try a different
ygData.messageBody:
I can see a great reason to do it. You have a guild that is all high level
characters. You've played a character to level 50 and want to try a
different class but want to play with your guild. Makes sense to me.

Fidan

-----Original Message-----
From: Azor [mailto:jmaynus@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 9:34 AM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Twinking & Kiting


From: "Azor" <jmaynus@...>

I don't really see why anyone would want to do this stuff. I mean I like to
earn my Lvls not have them handed to me. I either solo stuff I can kill
thats blue or black to me or I get in a group, which lately I've been
grouping, daytime I'm soloing then around 6pm or 7 I'm in a group till about
12a to 1 or later. I can understand having a friend help you out with money
and a better weapon or armor but thats about as far as I'd go. I wouldn't
want to be Lvl 4 with a full suit of Ruby, maybe banded and thats it. I'm
now Lvl 18 and I wear Banded, Chain and Mesh armor, some of it I bought and
other parts friends gave to me to help me out.

**************************
Azor
Lvl 18 Human Cleric of the Rathe
**************************


> From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>
>
> Its not impossible, I'll see about getting the screnshot, the guy is
> level 33 now tho and hasnt played as much, he may be up to around 15 days.
>
> (It can be done)
>
> Mr. J Daniels
